dict.acceptation: 盯着看；显眼；倒立，直竖起；

sent.orig: All I can do is stare at and wonder, stare at their laces and strapsand tread.
sent.trans: 我能做的，就是盯着鞋子，盯着鞋子的花边，盯着鞋带，盯着鞋面，想入非非。

sent.orig: You stare blindly into the abyss!
Men are men, and if you put your assets out in the open, men will stare.
sent.trans: 男人毕竟是男人，如果你暴露自己的宝贝，男人肯定会看。

sent.orig: What fiend possesses you to stare back at me, continually, with those infernal eyes?
sent.trans: 你中了什么魔了，总是不停地用那对凶眼睛盯着我？

sent.orig: You shouldn't always stare at others.
sent.trans: 你不要总是直瞪瞪地盯着人家看。
